name: Pursuit of the Pink Panther [A26]
description:
Pink Panther: Pinkadelic Pursuit is an arcade game developed by Etranges Libellules. It came out on 01-03-2003. Wanadoo Edition published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Pink Panther: Pinkadelic Pursuit on Game Boy Advance, PC and PlayStation.
